author: Voliko1

text:
@Phebie923 What actually happened was that Nintendo didn't want to release the official "more of the same" - Mario Bros. sequel to Western audiences because it was deemed too difficult.

So Nintendo took another game called "Doki Doki Panic" (that was deemed unmarketable outside Japan because it featured a cast of characters from a series of Japanese noodle commercials unfamiliar in Western territories), and replaced the characters with Mario and crew.
